member.name: M:EcommerceRestApi.Helpers.ModelsUtils.PropertyUtil.CopyProperties``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Extension method for copying property values from one object to another. Property must have the same type and name in order to be copied.
member.typeparam: Target type to which values will be copied.
Source type from which values will be copied.
member.param: Target object to which values will be copied.
